#!/usr/bin/env python

def main():
    N = int(raw_input())
    # what the fuck is this shit !
    while True:
        try:
            X = raw_input()
        except:
            break
        H = map(int, X.split())
        C = 0
        while H:
            e = H.pop(0)
            H2, C1, C2 = list(H), e, 0
            for i in xrange(len(H2)):
                if H2[i] > e-1:
                   C2 += H2[i]-(e-1)
                   H2[i] = e-1
            #print C+C2, H2, C+C1, H
            if C1 <= C2:
               C += C1
            else:
               C += C2
               H  = H2
        print C

main()
